item.title: My Music Journey
item.description: I could theoretically mention that when I was a little kid I would sing during school breaks. I could also mention that I really enjoyed the toy guitar that was bought for my brother on Christmas. Also the small kid's drum kit that I got somewhere in time ended up being some sort of premonition of the future to come, (for some reason that I cannot comprehend I never got a bass guitar).
